If relevant, also credit other organisations involved in collection of this particular datastream (as listed in 'credit' in the metadata record).

properties.history: 2024-06-08T19:19:13Z: Hourly aggregated file created. 2024-06-08T19:31:58Z: Gridded file created.
properties.lineage:
The Variable of Interest (VoI) is produced by sequentially interpolating linearly the individual values at pre-defined target depths using the 1-hour binned data from the Hourly Time Series Product. The number of instruments used for the interpolation at each timestamp is recorded in the VoI_count variable. If less that two instrument readings are present in the timestamp, fill values are stored in all depth bins. The resulting variable has dimensions TIME and DEPTH.  
This file was created using https://github.com/aodn/python-aodntools/blob/1.6.5/aodntools/timeseries_products/gridded_timeseries.py
properties.standard_name_vocabulary: NetCDF Climate and Forecast (CF) Metadata Convention Standard Name Table 45
properties.title: Gridded Time Series Product: TEMP interpolated at CH070 to fixed target depths at 1-hour time intervals, between 2009-08-15T00:00:00Z and 2024-04-17T23:00:00Z and 0 and 70 meters.
properties.description: Gridded Time Series Product: This file contains TEMP readings from all instruments deployed at the CH070 mooring site. The source of the values is the Hourly Time Series Product where TIME is fixed to 1-hour interval. The variable values are interpolated to a fixed target depths using a linear interpolation between consecutive existing depths. Only values flagged as 1 or 2 are used in the interpolation.

TEMP_count.description: number of observations in the water column

attrs.long_name: number of observations in the water column

attrs.comment: mean of all values over time interval
mean of all values over time interval
